item.description:
Speed Networking

Time and Place Date: Thursday, November 20, 2008
Time: 6:00pm - 9:00pm
Location: District Lounge
Street: 180 Lincoln St
City/Town: Boston, MA

Event Description:

Speed Networking with Boston Offline

Boston Offline Media is a socially conscious company that focuses on providing advertising venues that connect enterprises with Boston's communities of color.

In addition to connecting people on the Internet, Boston Offline Media also hosts a variety of events to facilitate “in person” connections. Known for the popular Professionals of Color After Work Mixer Series™, they have also hosted several business networking sessions and are co-producing the 1st Annual Dorchester Holiday Bazaar (see back for details).

Join us for Speed Networking! We garuntee that you will meet at least 5 new people and make new connections!
item.name: Professionals of Color Business & Social Networking Group November Meetup
